hero.description: I build exceptional and accessible digital experiences for the web. Focused on creating responsive, user-friendly interfaces with modern technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm a passionate frontend developer with a keen eye for design and a commitment to creating intuitive user experiences.
about.paragraph1: With over 5 years of experience in web development, I specialize in building modern, responsive websites and applications. I'm passionate about clean code, accessibility, and creating exceptional user experiences.
about.paragraph2: My journey in web development began when I built my first website in college. Since then, I've worked with various companies and clients to bring their digital visions to life.
about.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying outdoor activities.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.subtitle: I work with a variety of modern technologies to create responsive and interactive web experiences.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and expertise.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm currently open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out if you have a project in mind or just want to connect!
contact.name: Name
